copy.title: FAQ widget - Clickeen
copy.description: Build a fast, beautiful FAQ widget. Customize, publish, and localize in minutes.

copy.headline: One FAQ widget. All your answers. Any language.
copy.subheadline: Design it your way, publish once, and every live FAQ on your site updates with the latest answers.

copy.heading: Watch your FAQ build itself
copy.subhead: Enter your website URL and we'll write questions and answers for you instantly.

copy.title: Everything you need to build the perfect FAQ
copy.subhead: Explore templates, industry examples, and core features so you can ship faster with zero guesswork.

items.title: Find your look
items.body: Choose from Accordion, List, and Card layouts, then fine-tune typography and styles. Every pixel is customizable to feel native to your brand.

items.title: See the results
items.body: From hotels and rentals to restaurants and tours, see how teams use one FAQ widget to answer repeat questions clearly.

items.title: Unlock the power
items.body: Use Ombra AI, built-in localization, and SEO-ready output to scale without extra engineering.

copy.title: The world is your oyster
copy.subtitle: Welcome every website visitor like a local. Instant, natural translations for a global audience.

copy.title: Frequently Asked Questions
copy.subhead: Give visitors instant clarity, reduce repeat support questions, and keep your team focused on higher-value work.

items.title: Help customers get answers
items.body: Naturally answer the questions your visitors ask most. They find what they need instantly, right on your page.

items.title: Stop repeating yourself
items.body: Every question the widget answers is one less email or call you have to handle. Automate the repeats.

items.title: A win-win for everyone
items.body: When visitors get answers, they move forward with confidence. Your business stays focused while customers get helped.

copy.headline: Total design control
copy.subheadline: Radius. Shadows. Borders. Spacing. Tune every property in our visual editor without writing a single line of CSS.

copy.headline: One FAQ widget for all your answers in any language.
copy.body: Edit once, click Publish, and every live page shows the latest version.

copy.title: Global by default
copy.subhead: Reach global audiences with automatic translation and quick manual edits whenever brand wording needs a human touch.

items.title: Ombra AI
items.body: Generates and adapts copy for real UI use.

items.title: Performance
items.body: Edge delivery keeps load times fast worldwide.

copy.title: Built for real production traffic
copy.subhead: Fast edge delivery, dependable uptime behavior, and accessibility patterns that hold up on real production sites.

items.title: Reliability
items.body: Designed for high uptime under real load.

copy.headline: Build your FAQ in minutes
copy.subheadline: Launch free, customize your design, and publish a production-ready FAQ in minutes.
